derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from modern Latin fritillaria, from Latin fritillus 'dice box' (probably with reference to the chequered corolla of the snake's head fritillary)

means.word_mean: 1. any liliaceous plant of the genus Fritillaria having nodding variously colored flowers
2. butterfly with brownish wings marked with black and silver
